column1: Notice  of  auction  is  marked  as  P30.  Being  aggrieved  by  the  said  Resolution
passed by the 1st Respondent Bank, in the instant Application, the Petitioner is
1.  A Writ of Prohibition restraining the 1st and 2nd Respondents from taking
any steps in terms of P26.
2.  A Writ of Prohibition restraining the 1st and 2nd Respondents from taking
any steps in terms of the publications depicted in P29 and P30.
3.  A Writ of Certiorari quashing the publications marked P26, P29 and P30.
4.  A Writ of Certiorari quashing the Resolution dated 22-05-2019 depicted in
5.  A Writ of Prohibition restraining the 1st Respondent from selling by public
auction the properties mortgaged to the 1st Respondent by Mortgage Bonds
1240 (1R5) and 1241 (P9a) both dated 24-05-2010 attested by E.K.H.M.
